ComicInfo.Title: Kampf, Part 4: The Son Also Sets; Masques, Part 4: Empty Suit, Hollow Soul; Zuvembies Vs Robots Part 4: Reckless Abandonment
ComicInfo.Summary: It’s the bloody finales of all three tales of the latest Zombies vs Robots, and Chris Ryall promises no one will make it through unscathed: not Menton Matthews III, who illustrates the war-torn “Kampf;” neither artist Paul McCaffrey nor the iron-suited star of “Masques;” and certainly not Gabriel Hernandez, who lovingly renders zombie/zuvembie/robot carnage in “Zuvembies vs Robots.”
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:41. [CVDB213803]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gabriel Hernandez Walta, Menton3, Paul McCaffrey
ComicInfo.Inker: Gabriel Hernandez Walta, Menton3, Paul McCaffrey
